mdRecord.dcterms:title: Glorious news!: The triumph of Federal efforts. : Our administration have at length yielded to the offers long since made to settle our differences with Great-Britain. : The war hoop is silenced-- The acknowledgment of satisfaction for the outrage upon the Chesapeake .. is at last accepted. : On the repeal or suspension of the Non-Intercourse, the Embargo and Non-Importation laws, the Orders in Council are to be revoked, and a treaty is hereafter to be negociated
Triumph of Federal efforts
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Federal Party (N.Y.) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text, which is not signed, is followed by an extract of a letter from the Federal General Committee, dated New-York, Saturday 22nd April, 6 o'clock afternoon." [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library. [original]
